objects.specification: A flat rectangular showroom floor panel with a smooth polished surface, featuring a neutral grey tone reminiscent of modern exhibition halls. The texture evokes subtle reflection and a refined matte finish for an upscale ambiance.

A tall vertical wall panel with smooth surfaces and a light grey textured finish, designed for displaying car-related posters and branding. The modern minimalistic design provides a clean exhibition backdrop.

A tall vertical wall panel with smooth surfaces and a light grey textured finish, designed for displaying car-related posters and branding. The modern minimalistic design provides a clean exhibition backdrop.

A tall vertical wall panel with smooth surfaces and a light grey textured finish, designed for displaying car-related posters and branding. The modern minimalistic design provides a clean exhibition backdrop.

A tall vertical wall panel with smooth surfaces and a light grey textured finish, designed for displaying car-related posters and branding. The modern minimalistic design provides a clean exhibition backdrop.

A sleek modern demonstration sedan car with aerodynamic styling and smooth curved body panels, finished in a glossy red paint. It features contemporary details like alloy wheels, tinted windows, and a sculpted chassis ideal for exhibition display.

A minimalist modern reception desk with a clean geometric form, featuring a bright yellow front panel and contrasting white surfaces. It includes an open shelf below the countertop for brochures and visitor materials.
A tall vertical fabric banner with a slim rigid frame, showcasing vibrant car branding graphics. The material appears slightly translucent with a smooth finish and is mounted on a stable floor stand.
A tall vertical fabric banner with a slim rigid frame, showcasing vibrant car branding graphics. The material appears slightly translucent with a smooth finish and is mounted on a stable floor stand.
A small round coffee table with a tempered glass top and slender metal legs in a matte finish, featuring a minimal modern aesthetic to complement visitor seating areas.
A contemporary visitor lounge chair with an upholstered seat and backrest in bright yellow fabric, supported by a sleek metal frame. The ergonomic design invites comfortable seating.

A hanging cylindrical spotlight fixture with a metallic finish, casting focused white light downward. It features a subtle rim and internal reflector for a crisp illumination of key booth areas.
